title: Will college refund ComedK fees for KCET seat?
content: Will ComedK college refund the higher fees if seat is alloted by KCET for same college? Eg if a student secures ComedK seat in BMSCE and later gets seat in same college and course via KCET, will the college refund the difference in fees?

comments.body:
I request you to kindly post this question in r/ComedkColleges r/comedk 

**PESU DOES NOT COME UNDER COMEDK SO WE HAVE NO CLUE**
You've to first withdraw the comedk seat,then you'll be refunded,then pay kcet fees.
But KCET counselling has not yet started and may be delayed until Aug. By that time, the last date for surrender for ComedK may lapse
You can surrender your seat anytime.
